descriptionNullable:
I have scraped over 100k reviews from Hello Peter using their Application Program
Interface from different categories of business. I took reviews from 1-5 stars ratings from each business.
The data obtained can be used to build a Machine Learning Sentiment Model to classify sentiment of
complex reviews.
title: Business Reviews from different Industries
subtitle: Hello Peter Customer Reviews
